name: Snatie
description:
"Snatie" is a game about Satie, and about Snake.
Satie can be found in this game in the form of his piece "Vexations", a small chorale for keyboard instrument.
The piece bears the inscription: "In order to play the motif 840 times in succession,
it would be advisable to prepare oneself beforehand, and in the deepest silence,
by serious immobilities."

An "average" performance takes about 10-20 hours.

Snake can be found in this game in the form of the game being a game of "snake".

The one twist however, is that every food pallet you eat, not only makes your tail longer,

but the musical phrase that is played as well. Collect 24 food pallets to get the entire

24 beats of Vexation repeat over and over... and over and over... and over...

and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over,
and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over,
and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over,
and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over,
and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over, and over,

again.

Don't touch your tail though, then you'll have to do everything over again.
